name: Spenny Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of a micro-investing platform intended to invest roundup money in diversified portfolios. The company's platform collects spare change from daily digital transactions, rounds off the amount to the nearest ten rupee denomination and invests it into a diversified portfolio, enabling users to invest petty cash into various investment vehicles.
one_liner: Developer of a micro-investing platform intended to invest roundup money in diversified portfolios. The company's platform collects spare change from daily digital transactions, rounds off the amount to the nearest ten rupee denomination and invests it into a diversified portfolio, enabling users to invest petty cash into various investment vehicles.
